text: Moominiiney Yallih farmoyta- le migaaqal maseecina Mucammadow axcuk, sin fanal gari garuh elle seeca innal kaah maseecinay, kaa essekexxaay Yallih farmoytaaw axcuk kaah seeca, Nummah Yalli yaaxigeh siinik ittat rebsimmi iyyeh makta mara (munaafiqhiin kinnuk), tokkel Yallih farmoytih amri cinah yan mari, cibbarsimoonay umaane ken xagee kee hinnay qansarissa digaala ken xage takkeemik addunyaay akeeral
